name: RO-Football Association
description:
The official RO-Football Association, known as ROFA. 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ 
This is the most professional and well structured football group on ROBLOX (known as soccer to Americans).
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ 
Competitions: Gold League, Silver League, Gold League Cup, Prime League, Basic League, Prime League Cup, X League, Z League, X League Cup, Open League, Glory League, Merit League, Threes League.

shout.body: Good luck all teams in their season 20 campaign starting today.
